column1: So what did you like about the VR? That you got to use? What did you like about the VR
that when you look down like and you'll put your foot down it feels like you are free are outside
that's awesome, What did you not like about the VR? What did you not like about the VR?
<a lot of mumbling and thats> that I didn't know how to do the things
so you didn't know like where the buttons were
who do you think should decide like what VR experiences are good for children
is there anything else you want to tell me? What did you like best about the VR?
thank you so much for your time you've been such a great help
